articles.title: Brittney Griner discusses national anthem stance in return: ‘I definitely want to stand’ - Fox News
articles.description: WNBA star Brittney Griner made her regular-season return on Friday for the Phoenix Mercury, scoring 18 points. Griner stood for the national anthem before the game.
articles.content:
Brittney Griner made her 2023 WNBA regular-season debut
 on Friday and the seven-time All-Star immediately made her presence felt.
